nodes.text: Berardesco was a male Humanoid Mandalorian warrior who served the Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. The warrior was stationed on the planet Balmorra during Battle of Balmorra, where he was killed in a spaceport by a Republic aligned individual during the year 3642 BBY. Berardesco used two blaster pistols in combat and wore yellow Mandalorian armor.
